mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jumei2.jm_bt_images ( channel_id, image_key_1, image_key_2, image_key_3, image_type, image_index, origin_url, jm_url, syn_flg, created, creater, modified, modifier ) VALUES( #{channelId}, #{imageKey1}, #{imageKey2}, #{imageKey3}, #{imageType}, #{imageIndex}, #{originUrl}, #{jmUrl}, #{synFlg}, #{created}, #{creater}, #{modified}, #{modifier} )
